players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Something strange happened last night. I'm not sure what to make of it."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I'm sure of it. We need to lynch him."
You: "I think we should lynch Charlie. He's trying to distract us from the real issue."
Bob: "I'm innocent. I didn't kill Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
